body.name: Mixpresso 9 Cup Coffee Maker Stovetop Espresso Coffee Maker, Moka Coffee Pot with Coffee Percolator Design, Stainless Steel stovetop espresso maker, Italian Coffee Maker, Red Coffee Maker
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 8 hrs 33 mins
features: Stove Coffee Maker: Fuller and richer coffee, an actual Italian espresso maker brews an aromatic hot cup of espresso. The old fashioned espresso pot is perfect for your kitchen.

The Espresso Machine Is Easy To Use: Fill the lower part of the three-part with water, put the ground coffee into the basket, put the top on, and place the stainless steel espresso pot on the cooker to boil. Your expresso is ready within minutes!!

Stainless Steel Moka Pot: The stainless espresso maker stove top is made from heavy-duty stainless steel & a non-reactive interior suitable for all heat sources, including gas, ceramic, or electric stove.

Stove Coffee Maker Design: Our stove top espresso coffee maker comes with a solid black plastic handle; please do not put the stove top coffee maker over direct heat. 100% dishwasher safe & easy to clean. Permanet filter: With the permanent coffee filter, there is no need to purchase paper filters.
Customer Support: Mixpresso espresso stovetop & stovetop espresso makers are covered under our 1-year warranty!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mixpresso is one of the biggest brands in coffee machines & coffee accessories! This stove top coffee pot is one of our best sellers in coffee makers you can enjoy all tipes of your favorite ground coffee and brew it with this amazing metal stovetop coffee maker, It's a unique cafetera cubana made of top materials, We offer our espresso pots stove top at an amazing sale, so that you can enjoy a good & cheap coffee maker!

Stainless Espresso Maker Stove Top The stovetop coffee percolator is like your drip coffee maker, Moka pot, and Pour Over Chemex, all combined into this easy-to-use pot. Add ground coffee and water to brew hotter and stronger coffe. Replace your other coffee makers with this easy-to-use classic brewing coffee since 1810. Metal FilterI: Our stainless steal espresso maker has a metal filter; look at how much you will save on coffee filters and without buying special capsules. Durable Greca Coffee Maker: Always ready to make coffee; stop wasting money on all those electric coffee machines that break every couple of years. This stainless steel Italian espresso pot will stay in your kitchen when you need it. Use your percolator coffee pot for morning coffee; it can make 9 cups, and it’s even suitable for hosting friends. You can use a coffee percolator for any camping trip. Easy Pour Spout: Pour coffee out without opening the lid of the Cuban coffee maker, making it easier to use. Easy Pour Spout to avoid spilling. Ergonomic Handle: The ergonomic handle is comfortable to grab and allows you to open the lid of the coffee and espresso maker with one hand. Easier to handle and pour coffee.

Stovetop Coffee Brewer Thank You! We warmly welcome you to our club of Espresso enthusiasts and hope you will continue to enjoy our coffee machines and our nespresso compatible pods in the future. If you want to discover more about Mixpresso, please visit our website at Mixpresso.com

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool little coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to be able to try some ground coffee for a change instead of the pods and the Keurig. Looking for more flavor. It works quickly and it doesn't make a lot though. It says it's nine cups but there's only a small reservoir at the bottom so I doubt the nine cups.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for just one or two cups
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and fast! Make nice strong espresso-like coffee. Matter-of-fact it is the closest to espresso without using an espresso machine I have ever tasted. The handle was loose, but I took a screwdriver and tightened it. Perfect for just one or two cups!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was so excited to receive this moka pot, then it rusted after the first use. I have a tried-and-true Bialetti but I wanted the option of making a larger pot of expresso. This pot had a surprisingly high rating for the price but now I’m wondering if the material has changed because I don’t understand why anyone would give it a 5 star rating. Fundamentally because it’s not a moka pot — it’s a coffee pot. It does not develop sufficient pressure to brew expresso so the end result is really just minimally filtered, percolated coffee. Unfortunately, that’s the only primary problem with this pot. As you’ll note from the photo, it’s rusted. I used it one time and it rusted! The coffee stank and wasn’t even drinkable. When I disassembled the pot, it literally smelled like a stale cigar. Seriously, don’t waste your time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great and looks nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Makes the espresso
reviews.reviewText: This is a larger percolator than we had before. I like the color, it has a matte black finish on the top. There are two differences from the one we had prior. This one is a little harder to lift the top with one hand, it just requires a differnt kind of pressure with your thumb. It isnt a deal breaker just took me a few times to become used to it. The second thing is the stainless steel is a lot thinner. Overall, it works great just doesn't feel as high quality as I was expecting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does exactly what it's supposed to do.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because it's made with stainless steel. Lives up to expectations as an excellent coffee maker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Careful when cleaning-using gloves would help.
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to love this but unfortunately that's not the case. Now it does do what it's supposed to, the coffee comes out great However it's difficult to clean, trying to avoid getting scrapped or cut when trying to clean out the water reservoir because of the edges, and also cleaning the inside, in between the spout and bottom of the top container because of the design. Hopefully this makes sense.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: Nice coffee maker. I fill the bottom container with water up to just below the pressure valve, put coffee powder in the basket that goes into the bottom part, put filter and rubber gasket in the bottom of the upper part and screw the top part to the bottom part. Put it on stove and it percolates coffee into the upper part.Before buying I read another review mentioning difficulty with threads while screwing the top part. I was a little hesitant to buy at first but went ahead and bought it anyway. I used it for over ten days and had no difficulty screwing the top part to the bottom part at all. It probably varies from one piece to another piece. However, I do have another problem. While cleaning the bottom part, I had a good cut on the finger. The inside ring of the bottom part is very sharp. I have to see if I can make the inside ring blunt using a file. Other than that, it's a nice one. I am enjoying my coffee made from it.
Muy endeble del asa. No se puede destapar mientras hierve porque a través de la tapa pasa el vapor caliente.
